entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
